CustomField.description: The dock number is used to direct a driver to the correct location at a customer or network facility where they should load/unload the freight as many facilities have designated docks for pickup or delivery.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The dock number is used to direct a driver to the correct location at a customer or network facility where they should load/unload the freight as many facilities have designated docks for pickup or delivery.
CustomField.label: Dock Number
